descriptions: "resting blood pressure (in mm Hg on admission to the hospital)"

column4: Value 1: having ST-T wave abnormality (T wave inversions and/or ST elevation or depression of > 0.05 mV)
column5: Value 2: showing probable or definite left ventricular hypertrophy by Estes' criteria"
